CKDMTCriticalSection Class Reference

#include <KDCriticalSection.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Critical section class multi-thread version.

This policy of the class is deny a thread lock the same object many times.
It means when the thread locked the object twice, and the second time will be waiting for.

Member Function Documentation

bool CKDMTCriticalSection::Start ( bool  bWait = true  )  [inline]

Start the critical section.

Parameters:
bWait IN: wait for other process stop or not
Returns:
true if entered critical section. Otherwise false. If set bWait true, always return true.
